attributes.additional_details:
Education is met to be open to all and having to see that disabled people are dropping out due to lack of support is greatly disappointing.
I would want the government to address the lack of support after 18 and beyond.
attributes.background:
The disabled community are being hard done by with lack of support within the further education.
I went through an experience of no support as a disabled black man.
And being a disability advocate I have come to realize people within my community are still struggling to gain equal support.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do differently. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
